QuestData.Title: Setting Sun Garrison
QuestData.Description: We've taken losses from the mogu forces descending the Golden Stair and their flanking attackers at Whitepetal Lake. Our lines are thin.$B$BI'm dispatching Anji and Kun to the Setting Sun Garrison to double our efforts at training new recruits. I'd like you there with them, $n. Show them what a true $c is made of.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Anji Autumnlight at the Setting Sun Garrison.
